testcase.name: Admin edit the user details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enter username and password.......................................passed Then User clicks the login button...........................................passed And User is on the dashboard................................................passed When User clicks the marketing option.......................................passed Then User clicks the affiliates option......................................passed Then User is in the affiliates page.........................................passed When Admin clicks the edit button"Hukomuko".................................passed And Admin visits the Edit Affiliate page....................................passed Then Admin changed the firstname"Ananya"....................................passed And Admin clicks the save button............................................passed Then Admin gets the success message.........................................passed And Admin checks the two values"Ananya".....................................passed
